item.title: Cesis is the best theme to get to easily build sites
item.dc:creator: Tam
item.content:encoded:
[vc_row css=".vc_custom_1508068042154{padding-right: 15% !important;padding-left: 15% !important;}"][vc_column][vc_custom_heading text="Cesis comes with tons of options, all the theme panel options can be changed page by page if needed, change menus, color, layout super easily without having to code or modify anything." font_container="tag:h2|font_size:22|text_align:left|line_height:1.7em" google_fonts="font_family:Open%20Sans%3A300%2C300italic%2Cregular%2Citalic%2C600%2C600italic%2C700%2C700italic%2C800%2C800italic|font_style:400%20regular%3A400%3Anormal" css=".vc_custom_1508036159221{margin-bottom: 45px !important;}"][vc_column_text]Our theme is the most advanced and user-friendly theme you will find on the market, we have documentation and video to help set your site really easily, pre-installed demos you can import in one click and everything from the theme options to page content can be edited from the front-end. This is the theme you are looking for.
The main reason our customers love us is because the theme has been built with them in mind. Cesis had been made by professional but can be used by anyone even if you don't have any knowledge of coding. This is the theme you want if you are looking for unlimited possibilities.[/vc_column_text][vc_single_image image="7938" img_size="full" css=".vc_custom_1508563763375{margin-right: -75px !important;margin-left: -75px !important;}"][vc_custom_heading text="You can customize anything you see directly from the front-end, see the changes you make live and you don't need to code anything to do it." font_container="tag:h3|font_size:16|text_align:center|color:%23cccccc|line_height:30px" text_transform="cesis_text_transform_uppercase" letter_spacing="2" use_theme_fonts="yes" css=".vc_custom_1508069154233{margin-bottom: 11px !important;}"][vc_custom_heading text="cesis developer" font_container="tag:h4|font_size:14|text_align:center|color:%23333333|line_height:24px" text_transform="cesis_text_transform_uppercase" letter_spacing="2" use_theme_fonts="yes" css=".vc_custom_1508036020297{margin-bottom: 67px !important;}"][vc_custom_heading text="Cesis the best Multipurpose WordPress Theme." font_container="tag:h3|font_size:24|text_align:left" use_theme_fonts="yes" css=".vc_custom_1508068449817{margin-bottom: 36px !important;}"][vc_column_text css=".vc_custom_1508035905110{margin-bottom: 31px !important;}"]Cesis has been coded so the theme is as light as possible, only load script when needed but still let you do the most awesome thing you could imagine. It comes with a theme panel that will let you modify anything you want without having to code or modify anything from the theme. Everything can be done from the front-end in live.
Cesis is 100% responsive, you can choose the break point of the page elements or menus. The theme will looks perfect in any devices. It can easily be translated and is compatible with the well known WPML plugin, of course the theme has been test and is 100% RTL compatible. The theme has been made and coded in order to fit the search engine requirements, in addition to this you can also use the well know seo plugins.We have a really well explained documentation and also video ready to help you understand how to use Cesis and of course a support team. Do not hesitate any more and get Cesis now.[/vc_column_text][cesis_icon_list space="16" margin_bottom="30" icon_color="#69d2e7" h_icon_color="#69d2e7" values="%5B%7B%22icon%22%3A%22fa-checkmark%22%2C%22text%22%3A%22Unlimited%20layout%2C%20colors%20options%22%7D%2C%7B%22icon%22%3A%22fa-checkmark%22%2C%22text%22%3A%22Front-end%20editor%2C%20live%20modifications%22%7D%2C%7B%22icon%22%3A%22fa-checkmark%22%2C%22text%22%3A%22Multi%20language%2C%20RTL%20ready%20%22%7D%2C%7B%22icon%22%3A%22fa-checkmark%22%2C%22text%22%3A%22Single%20page%20%26%20post%20options%22%7D%2C%7B%22icon%22%3A%22fa-checkmark%22%2C%22text%22%3A%22Incredible%20support%20and%20updates%22%7D%5D"][vc_column_text css=".vc_custom_1508068720236{margin-bottom: 70px !important;}"]Cesis can easily be translated and is compatible with the well known WPML plugin, of course the theme has been test and is 100% RTL compatible. We have an excellent customer support. And the theme is amazing. Once you get used to it, it will accelerate and improve your website design.[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][/vc_row]

It comes with a theme panel that will let you modify anything you want without having to code or modify anything from the theme. Everything can be done from the front-end in live.

item.title: Calm and Relaxation
item.dc:creator: Tam
item.content:encoded:
[vc_row][vc_column][vc_custom_heading text="Cesis comes with tons of options, all the theme panel options can be changed page by page if needed, change menus, color, layout super easily without having to code or modify anything. Our theme is the most advanced and user-friendly theme you will find on the market, we have documentation and video to help set your site really easily, pre-installed demos you can import in one click and everything from the theme options to page content can be edited from the front-end. This is the theme you are looking for, don't wait and purchase it right now." font_container="tag:h2|font_size:22|text_align:left|line_height:1.7em" google_fonts="font_family:Open%20Sans%3A300%2C300italic%2Cregular%2Citalic%2C600%2C600italic%2C700%2C700italic%2C800%2C800italic|font_style:300%20light%20regular%3A300%3Anormal" css=".vc_custom_1508745190114{margin-bottom: 41px !important;}"][vc_column_text css=".vc_custom_1508745202581{margin-bottom: 31px !important;}"]The main reason our customers love us is because the theme has been built with them in mind. Cesis had been made by professional but can be used by anyone even if you don't have any knowledge of coding. This is the theme you want if you are looking for unlimited possibilities.The theme has been made and coded in order to fit the search engine requirements, in addition to this you can also use the well know seo plugins.We have a really well explained documentation and also video ready to help you.[/vc_column_text][vc_custom_heading text="How to improve your lifestyle?" font_container="tag:h3|font_size:30|text_align:left|color:%23222222|line_height:1.6em" google_fonts="font_family:Playfair%20Display%3Aregular%2Citalic%2C700%2C700italic%2C900%2C900italic|font_style:700%20bold%20regular%3A700%3Anormal" css=".vc_custom_1510460857809{margin-bottom: 18px !important;}"][vc_column_text css=".vc_custom_1508745245309{margin-bottom: 47px !important;}"]The main reason our customers love us is because the theme has been built with them in mind. Cesis had been made by professional but can be used by anyone even if you don't have any knowledge of coding. This is the theme you want if you are looking for unlimited possibilities.The theme has been made and coded in order to fit the search engine requirements, in addition to this you can also use the well know seo plugins.We have a really well explained documentation and also video ready to help you.[/vc_column_text][vc_single_image image="8329" img_size="full" alignment="center"][vc_custom_heading text="You can customize anything you see directly from the front-end, see the changes you make live and you don't need to code anything to do it." font_container="tag:h3|font_size:30|text_align:center|color:%23cccccc|line_height:1.6em" text_resize="yes" text_minimum="18" letter_spacing="" google_fonts="font_family:Open%20Sans%3A300%2C300italic%2Cregular%2Citalic%2C600%2C600italic%2C700%2C700italic%2C800%2C800italic|font_style:300%20light%20italic%3A300%3Aitalic" css=".vc_custom_1508745126018{margin-bottom: 50px !important;}"][vc_custom_heading text="Cesis the best Multipurpose WordPress Theme." font_container="tag:h3|font_size:30|text_align:left|color:%23222222|line_height:1.6em" google_fonts="font_family:Playfair%20Display%3Aregular%2Citalic%2C700%2C700italic%2C900%2C900italic|font_style:700%20bold%20regular%3A700%3Anormal" css=".vc_custom_1510460866285{margin-bottom: 18px !important;}"][vc_column_text css=".vc_custom_1508744538357{margin-bottom: 31px !important;}"]Cesis has been coded so the theme is as light as possible, only load script when needed but still let you do the most awesome thing you could imagine. It comes with a theme panel that will let you modify anything you want without having to code or modify anything from the theme. Everything can be done from the front-end in live. Cesis is 100% responsive, you can choose the break point of the page elements or menus. The theme will looks perfect in any devices. It can easily be translated and is compatible with the well known WPML plugin, of course the theme has been test and is 100% RTL compatible. The theme has been made and coded in order to fit the search engine requirements, in addition to this you can also use the well know seo plugins.We have a really well explained documentation and also video ready to help you understand how to use Cesis and of course a support team. Do not hesitate any more and get Cesis now.
  • Unlimited layout, colors options
  • Front-end editor, live modifications
  • Multi language, RTL ready
  • Single page & post options
  • Incredible support and updates
[/vc_column_text][vc_column_text css=".vc_custom_1508068720236{margin-bottom: 70px !important;}"]Cesis can easily be translated and is compatible with the well known WPML plugin, of course the theme has been test and is 100% RTL compatible. We have an excellent customer support. And the theme is amazing. Once you get used to it, it will accelerate and improve your website design.[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][/vc_row]

It comes with a theme panel that will let you modify anything you want without having to code or modify anything from the theme. Everything can be done from the front-end in live.
